```{r}
library(CodeClanData)
```

```{r}




str(beer)

beer$calories <- as.numeric(beer$calories)

beer$calories

mean(beer$calories)

mean(beer$percent)

mean(beer$carbohydrates)


?order
percent_order <- order(beer$percent, decreasing = TRUE)
beer[percent_order, ]

high_cal_beer <- subset(beer, calories > mean(calories))

class(high_cal_beer)

hist(beer$calories)

```
